Description: Glazed single-spouted and single-handled bowl; glazed composition, covered with turquoise glaze; bowl with flat, unglazed bottom; end of spout missing.
Curator's comments: Cf. R. Mason & J. Tugwell, 'Fatimid Tall-Necked Lamps and Their Associates: A Typology', Journal of the American Research Center in Egypt 47 (2011) 335-53, esp. 341-2.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Frederick Du Cane Godman
